name: Imerys SA
goal:
Imerys is the world leader in mineral-based specialty solutions for industry, with 17,769 employees and 4.590 billion euros revenue in 2018. Imerys is active in 50 countries with 230 industrial sites and draws on its knowledge of applications, scientific expertise and technological know-how to offer solutions beneficiating its mineral resources, produce synthetic minerals and
develop formulations. Imerys thus contributes essential properties to customers’ products and performance, such as refractoriness, hardness, conductivity, opacity, durability, purity, lightness, filtration, absorption and repellency. Imerys meets ambitious criteria for responsible development, regarding social, environmental or Corporate Governance.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Imerys follows the activities of the EU institutions principally related to raw materials, resources efficiency, climate change & emission trading scheme (ETS), reporting of minerals resources & reserves, health and safety, circular economy, environment (including, mining waste, biodiversity and industrial emissions), product stewardship (e.g., REACH and RCS <Respirable Crystalline Silica>), innovation and industrial policy.
